#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cctype>
#include<cmath>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

#define S(t); scanf("%d",&t);
#define Sl(t); scanf("%lld",&t);
#define P(t); printf("%d\n",t);
#define Pl(t); printf("%lld\n",t);
#define REP(i,n) for(i=0; i<n; i++)
#define MAXN 1010
#define MOD 100000007



using namespace std;


typedef long long int llint;

int main()
{
    int i,j,t,n;
    
    S(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        S(n);
        int temp=n;
        
        int prevr, r, c1=0, c2=0, c=0;
        
        prevr=n%10;
        n=n/10; 
        
        while(n != 0)
        {
            r = n % 10;
            n /= 10;
            
            if(r >= prevr)
            c1++;
            if(r <= prevr)
            c2++;
            
            c++;
            prevr=r;
        }
        
        if(c1 >= c || c2 >= c)
        printf("0\n");
        else
        printf("1\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
